response.overview: A maid is raped by her boss and then kicked out of the house. The maid, who has become pregnant, gives birth to her child, and because she cannot take care of her child, she abandons him. A driver finds the child and keeps him with him, and by following up, he first finds his mother and then forces the boss to marry his former maid.
response.title: شکوفه‌های امید
